statements: DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM another_table WHERE condition);
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount < 100 AND transaction_date < '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1 AND amount > 100
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'johndoe@example.com'
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Phone%' AND unit_price < 500
DELETE FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Smith' AND email = 'john@example.com';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = '6dcde118-d074-4f8d-a60c-3e36c7d8636d' AND product_id = '4535800e-0da6-4976-8e5a-d0084cc557ce';
